dialog: What the hell is he doing?
First he's late and now he's being a jerk.
Just grab the bags and let's get going.
This prick can forget about a tip.
By the way, thanks for the help with the bags.
Never again are we hiring this company.
It's the same Ron who said he'd get me on the golf course for half price.
You know what happened that day?
I paid for four people to go at full price.
Well, if you close this business deal, we can buy our own golf course.
You know who won't be playing on our course?
Shouldn't we have taken this turnoff?
Hey! What the hell are you doing?
If we miss this flight, I'm going to have you fired, jerk!
Who does he think he is?
I don't know, it looks like we're in some kind of industrial park.
Jackie, something weird is going on.
Please, take what you want, just don't hurt us!
If this is a kidnapping, I can get you money!
You're worth more dead than alive.
So after hacking into the satellite, I was able to download loads of data and a clear pattern emerged.
The eyes in the sky are fixated on coordinates with very distinctive radioactive signatures, and why is that?
Did you hear what I just said?
Aliens could be watching right now.
Court order: no hacking, no computer access.
We live in the 21st century, and you're my lawyer.
That's why I hired you, to stop the government conspiracy against me.
And as your lawyer, it's my job to keep you out of jail!
That's like Lord of the Rings with no Gandalf.
That is why I'm seeing you on short notice at my house.
I promise, I will get that order rescinded as soon as I get back.
How do I know you're not just saying this to keep me calm, but in fact you're planning on moving to Europe and working with the world bank and...
There's no conspiracy here, and I am not moving to Europe.
That is why I took your case probono because I believe that you have a voice, so you've just got to trust me.
Ok, I will see you next week.
You know, we don't have to go if you don't want to go.
I just think it'd be good for us to get away, you know, with some new friends.
"Welcome to Second Chance Retreat, "where couples go to grow love." Wow, really?
They need a new catch phrase.
It's not about the catch phrase, Greg.
It's like any other vacation, only you get to work on your relationship.
You do realize you said "vacation" and "work" in the same sentence?
A couple's retreat can work wonders.
It's the secret to our happiness.
It's like a tuneup for our marriage.
Leave it to men to compare marriage to cars.
So exactly how backwoods is this place?
Well, my friends, we get to arrive in style.
I'm not a fan of surprises.
Any chance we'll be stopping soon?
We've been driving for, like, three hours.
We're not so far away from the departure point.
Uhoh, looks like we've got company.
What seems to be the problem?
No, I'm sorry, I did not.
I'll need to see your license and registration.
The rest of you folks, can I see your ID as well?
We've had a rash of drug runners come through the state.
I'm just gonna run these through the computer.
Like I said earlier, we're arriving in style.
Something tells me this is not going to be an ordinary trip.
Wow, you weren't kidding when you said traveling in style.
Well, welcome to Second Chance Retreat.
So, does this get the Forrester's seal of approval?
It's so much nicer than I imagined.
We'll wait for the second chopper with the bags.
Place your hand on the outline, please.
The security ID links to your unique prints and lets you into your room.
I had the same reaction last time I was here.
And now I'll take a picture.
Once you check in, the doctor will be around to do a medical.
They're gonna take a blood sample, check your heartbeat, basically just checking to see if you're alive and breathing.
I'll show you to your rooms.
I just need to call the office and make sure there aren't any fires to put out.
We have a cell blocker to prevent any calls.
We are officially off the grid.
It's to help mend the relationship.
Trust me, you'll be thanking me in a week.
The security, is that really necessary?
Unfortunately, some of the wives attack their husbands during therapy.
It makes for a dangerous environment.
No, it's for the insurance company.
They insisted on it, I don't know why.
I'll stick with the angry wife scenario.
Speaking of angry wives, let's go find them before they spend all your money.
Oh, man. This place is awesome.
Doesn't it seem a little weird?
Can we just get through the week?
Look, if you want me to get another room, if you're uncomfortable...
They're expecting us for dinner in an hour.
I'm willing to make it work.
You just have to make an attempt.
âª âª Is it just me or is this place completely empty?
Russell Green, and this is my wife, Ira.
You've got that whole "kicked in the nads" look.
I'm sorry, I forgot his muzzle at home.
So how did you hear about this place?
Oh, well our friends James and Serena, they've been here before, they swear by it.
Out of nowhere a woman shows up, tells us we've been selected to participate in a weeklong retreat and, well, three words sealed the deal for us: "all expenses paid".
Who would turn down an all expenses paid holiday?
I mean, they're looking for the right candidates, and that's Ira and I.
Sour, miserable, irritable, old, and ornery.
Russ figures if this can change us, it can change anyone.
Well, I doubt a week will do the trick.
I keep telling her there's no easy trick to saving a marriage.
What the hell are you doing?!
She needs to come with me.
There, that feeling, defending a loved one.
It means she's someone important to you.
I know who I am and why I am here.
I'm going to give you the means to keep your relationship together.
I hope you all enjoy your week.
He puts on a big show.
It's worth the price of admission.
They wanted a reaction out of us and it worked.
Granted, he may have taken it a little bit too far.
May have taken it too far?
I stepped in front of you.
What else do you want from me?
Yeah, it must have been a real stretch for you, Greg.
Some of you may be having second thoughts.
You are comfortable with the status quo.
You are looking for any excuse to keep things the way they are.
If you feel this way, if you are too weak to block out that scared little voice inside your head, then there is the door.
Again, welcome to Second Chance Retreat.
We were expecting a larger group but the weather took a turn for the worse.
True, but not from where we fly from the east.
So until the weather changes it will just be us.
Is there no other way in?
There is a remote road through Edgewater County but it's not exactly userfriendly.
But on the bright side it gives us a chance to get to know each other even better.
I will get to know you from the inside and out.
Now, if I could ask you to place your identification in the bowl.
Well, it is vital that we shed symbols of our identity before we can possibly work on our relationships.
I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable giving my ID to someone I hardly know.
Someone you hardly know or someone you don't like?
You're the guru, you tell me.
Well, like Lucy said, you're the guru.
We had the same reaction last year.
It is very nice to see returning couples.
I'm really excited for this week's retreat.
Now tomorrow I would like to start with personal sessions.
I will work with each couple individually.
I would love to start with Greg and Lucy in the morning.
Thank you for a lovely evening.
It has been a pleasure, but now I have some business to attend to.
Greg and Lucy Forrester, married six years, almost seven.
Tell me about the life you share.
And you know what they say about lawyers.
I don't know, I was just joking, Lucy.
What's with the emphasis on our health?
I don't see how it's relevant.
Well, as you know, disease can put a strain on a relationship.
Well, of course, but you already had us medically checked.
You know, digging any deeper seems a little personal.
After all, I am a lawyer, I know my rights.
You do not like to be vulnerable.
That is what you're doing and you do it all the time.
We both have a clean bill of health.
It's never been an issue for us.
Um, may I ask you about your family history?
My father actually died last year.
Only child raised by a single mom.
She was just diagnosed with dementia a few years back.
Tell me how you two met.
We used to sit on opposite sides of class.
We never spoke to each other.
Until we booked the same time at the observatory.
He loved gazing at the stars.
Tell me about the struggles in your marriage.
This is the place to face them.
I'm sorry, I can't do this.
How many times do I have to tell you, nothing else happened between us?
How many times do I have to tell you that?
You didn't seem to mind, did you?
I needed you, and you checked out.
So I drove you into the arms of another woman?
And for a second, god help me, I needed it.
But if you didn't walk through that alley, I would have pushed her away.
We came here to save our marriage.
You've just gotta give me one more day.
Just give me one more day.
I can't go back in there.
Let's just go for a walk.
I just finished the personal interviews with the Forresters.
I think we should dig a little deeper.
They... they may be hiding something.
It's... it's no problem, it's just I want to cover all the bases.
We've had a 100 percent success rate up until this point.
It's getting dark soon so maybe we should head back?
You know, it's gonna be a little quicker if we go straight back the way we came.
Ok, which way would that be?
Uh... well, if we head down there, go across the river to that trail, it should lead us back to the retreat.
Shouldn't we just go back the way we came?
Why don't we just go back the way we came?
I'll just go down and check how deep the river is.
I don't think this is a good idea.
It's safe to cross, the river's only ankle deep.
I don't think this looks safe.
I felt it, it felt like someone pushed me!
Did you see somebody up there?
You think I just fell down the hill?
I don't know, maybe you tripped.
I think someone tried to push me down a hill.
I think someone's trying to kill me.
I know it sounds crazy but I know I saw someone.
You can't be sure you saw someone.
Maybe a branch snapped and hit you or something.
Well, it makes more sense than someone trying to kill you.
But why would someone try to hurt you?
Are you suggesting it's someone from the resort?
We were just about to send out a search party to look for you.
Lucy was just telling us that...
Oh, we went on a hike and we thought we saw a bear and just got spooked and I just...
The woods are not a good place after dark.
You should stay on the retreat grounds.
Now, we are about to dine in a few minutes.
I think someone is trying to kill me, and it could be anyone here!
Lucy, we were dehydrated, we were tired, we were hungry.
We could have seen Bigfoot in those conditions.
I need you to believe me.
I... I don't think that's a good idea.
I mean, with all this medical crap and the guards, I'm getting a bad feeling about this place.
Yeah, as soon as we can.
So this is what you're after?
You're gonna come up with any excuse to get out of here.
Ok, you're gonna believe a conspiracy that someone's trying to kill you?
You believe in that more than us.
I think he went that way.
I'm sorry, I didn't mean to scare you.
Serena and James told us what happened.
I think someone might want to hurt Russ and I, too.
Well, strange things have been happening to us since we got here.
I feel like we're being watched.
Russ always insisted we put our valuables, ID, cash, credit cards in a money belt and we never took it off.
We only took it off when we went to bed.
Wait, you didn't give your ID to Koslov?
Well, I gave him a library card.
And we never put anything in the safe.
The other day I check my money belt, my ID was gone.
That was the first thing we did and he said we should check again just to make sure.
He even went back with us to look.
And sure enough all our ID was under the bed, like it had just slipped out somehow.
Someone had to have come in our room and taken it when we were sleeping.
Has anything gone missing from your room?
Not that I know of, but we use the safe.
I just... I just have a terrible feeling about this place.
Yeah, for once we agree on something.
I was wondering what had happened to you.
Now that I have you here, I should let you know that it is not safe to wander away from the retreat, especially at night, and we would not want anything to happen to you.
You don't think he heard, do you?
Don't worry, everything is gonna be fine.
I'm gonna go check on Greg.
I... I talked to Ira last night, she didn't say anything.
Sorry, you'll have to talk to Mr. Koslov.
What can I do for you?
They're probably about an hour from the retreat now.
We should be able to locate them shortly.
Is there something you're not telling me?
Um... I'm going to go find Greg.
The next group is due to arrive tomorrow and the investors want assurance that there will be no delays.
After all, for some people it's a matter of life and death.
It's 15 miles of rough terrain, we'll find them.
I want to be part of the search party.
I appreciate your concern, but let's leave this to the professionals.
If that's the case then we should call the cops.
I mean, they could be hurt, or worse.
I mean, you said that there's predators out there.
Mrs. Forrester, we have this under control.
How does someone get away so easily?
They went and told Koslov and when they came back, they found their IDs on the floor like they had just fallen out.
So someone broke into Russ and Ira's room and stole their IDs?
And credit cards while they were sleeping.
And then put it back so it didn't raise any alarm bells?
When was the last time you checked the safe?
Well, we both failed, so not much of a coincidence.
A leaky gas line fed some carbon monoxide into the room, it's lucky that we found you when we did.
Yes, being off the grid, we use generators.
But not to worry, the problem has been solved for now.
The last thing I remember is my wife and I trying to get into our safe.
The damn thing kept rejecting us.
It seems to be working fine.
Did you find Russ and Ira?
No, not yet, but the police are looking into it.
I promise to keep you both posted.
Um, again I am very sorry for this inconvenience.
I have some other things to attend to.
Maybe the gas leak wasn't an accident.
Why would Koslov want to kill us?
Why would he want us dead?
I mean, you've seen the security guards, they're always watching, always around.
I mean, what if maybe he still needs something from us and once he has it, we...
I'm going to go take a bath and clear my head.
Yeah, there's some in my bag.
Koslov wants us to join him for dinner.
Russ and Ira are still missing.
Shouldn't we have a search party?
I'm sorry if I seem insensitive, but when we were here a year ago two couples just up and left.
One walked the whole way home and then the other just canoed down the river.
No, that's not the only thing.
The point is I want out, Luce wants out.
No, coming here was a mistake.
Buying into your twisted delusion that this couple's retreat is going to save our marriage.
I'm sorry, but Serena and I are staying.
Greg, I never meant for you to find those papers.
I just thought about it one time and...
Look, we've gotta stick together to get out of here.
And don't forget to pack this.
My wife and I want out now.
As far as I'm considered, this is all crap.
We want out now, or we're calling the cops.
It sounds to me like your wife wants a divorce.
You're not the first one to get the divorce bomb, Greg.
The same thing happened to Russ and Ira.
Russ left and Ira went after him.
She was afraid he would clean out the bank accounts while she was here.
I got a message from the police, they found them at home.
The neighbours had called because they were yelling and screaming.
As I said, they're very wealthy.
She chartered the plane out of here.
Greg, the helicopter will be coming later on this afternoon, you're welcome to take it.
But I ask you, please, stay until after dinner.
If you feel the same way, I will drive you out personally.
This is not a prison, Greg.
Is there anything else I can do for you?
I want a room to myself until we leave.
I think we should start the transfer right away.
I think I realized I want him.
We need to convince him to stay.
We need to convince him that you are the best thing that's ever happened to him.
You're a good friend but I can assure you he does not feel that way.
Well, let's show him what he's about to lose.
You are going to look smoking hot tonight.
I don't think this is a good idea.
( On the screen ) Please disable the battery.
How unfortunate that the vehicle the Forresters could use has suffered a mechanical malfunction.
âª âª âª âª Ah, Mr. Forrester.
I am so glad you decided to stay.
I'm just holding up my end of the bargain.
I see the rest of the guests have arrived.
She's not really the party type.
Who are you, and what have you done with Lucy?
I love this dress on you.
May I talk to my wife?
I saw them sabotage the Jeep so it won't start.
I told him that we were leaving tonight otherwise I would call the cops.
He has no intention of driving us back.
I have a feeling if we stick around...
We've gotta get out of here.
I'm going to steal us a Jeep.
I see you have been calming the storm.
Discord is never a good thing.
It's all going to be over in a few days.
âª âª Meet me at the back of the lodge in five minutes.
You're not going anywhere without me and I'm not taking no for an answer.
Well, if we're going to do this we need to step away without anyone noticing.
Ok, so we need a diversion.
That's great, now we need to change.
Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
What are you doing out here?
Just giving Greg some space to cool off.
Oh, I didn't mean to pry.
How did you find me out here?
I was just getting some air.
I recognized it from the dance.
Oh yeah, um, sorry about Serena's dress.
Well, I'm going to head back in.
Do you want to join me?
I'm just gonna be out here for a few minutes.
I'm going to confirm the buyer right now.
( Radio ) Charlie, I need you in sector four.
You've been watching us the whole time.
What are you up to, Koslov?
You know, Greg, you're beginning to get on my nerves.
I think it is time you met the surgeon.
We've gotta get out of here!
That room is filled with bodies!
We have to get out of here!
We have... we have to warn Serena and James!
Someone's coming, do you trust me?
You do not want to stress the organs.
Who do you think you are?
Well, here my name is Mr. Koslov.
But back home I'm known as Vassily Bolkin, a highly skilled surgeon who, because of an unfortunate accident, was stripped of my medical license.
I struggled and I scraped for two years until a very fortunate circumstance allowed me to save the life of a man who had been shot.
This man had a very lucrative business collecting identities and then making the victims disappear.
I convinced him that there was value in the bodies, more profit to be made.
So you just butchered all those people?
Only now I take a life to give a life.
No one can hear you scream.
First, your wife is going to die, and then you are going to cease to exist.
Doc, I told you to sedate her.
You two are involved in this, too?
I prefer to be called an opportunists.
Who'd have thought an accountant would have a gun?
( James) Such a nice gun, sneaky little prick.
Next thing you know he's shooting at us.
( Serena ) Fortunate for us he was a bad shot.
( James ) We wanted to take him alive.
This man had access to a lot of money.
But now we couldn't leave a witness behind.
We had to find a doctor who could keep his mouth shut.
And lucky for us, we had the pleasure of meeting Dr. Koslov.
( Serena ) It's not often you meet someone special, who can take an unfortunate situation and turn it into a money making operation.
We went from stealing identities to harvesting and selling body parts as well.
Do you know how much a kidney sells for on the black market?
And definitely more than what either of you would make in a year.
Didn't anyone ever teach you that?
It's all going to be over soon, you two will no longer exist.
Well, your heart, your liver, your kidneys and your lungs might.
How long have you been playing us for?
We accessed your medical history, your business information, you're wonderful candidates for the program, and in desperate need of some counseling.
Watched you, frequented the same haunts.
Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
You won't get away with this.
Where are you going to go?
We're doing you a favour, really.
I mean, thanks to us, you two are gonna give someone a great gift.
It's time to make the final arrangements with the buyer, collect our money.
Don't have too much fun, either.
We have other guests to tend to.
They make me a very wealthy man.
Someone is going to find out what you're doing and stop you.
They'll wind up on my table in the end.
We do not want to stress the organs any more than we have to.
Would you prefer I did this without anesthetic?
Otherwise you'll be awake the whole time!
We can't let them get away with this.
There could be fifty IDs here!
We've gotta take this for evidence.
âª âª What do you see?
( car engine attempting to start ) Hey!
You just let them get away.
This is why I have insurance.
You get sloppy, you get burned.
Put them on ice until we find a replacement for Koslov.
They just took off with our laptop.
Let's get back to the house and clean up the mess.
I knew we should have killed them when we had the chance.
Don't ever tell me what I should do.
And they may be able to track the cell phone.
We should probably just lay low and go to the police in the morning.
Yeah, I think you are right.
Ladies and gentlemen, there's been a change of plans.
I need you to come with me now.
Let's go, let's go, let's go.
Eat my food, drink my booze, and you don't want to listen to me?
We made it this far so I doubt they're gonna find us.
I see the aliens haven't gotten to you yet.
I need to ask you a huge favour.
It's something that I've told you not to do a thousand times.
It could be dangerous and it's completely illegal.
( Lucy ) Ok, now listen, are you able to track the cell phone?
( Troy ) Come on, that's child's play.
Give me something harder than that.
( Lucy ) We were being held in a resort about an hour from where we are now.
I'll access the previous cell calls, triangulate location from cell towers and voila busted.
( Lucy ) I need you to hack into their security system.
( Lucy ) Once you're in, this is what I need you to do...
That's just what they told us.
Who knows what else they do.
All we know is that they're stealing people's identities and they're selling their organs until there's nothing left.
And who knows how many victims there's already been?
And there's gonna be more victims if we don't stop them.
They have more recruits flying in today.
I know it sounds farfetched, but you've gotta believe us.
I'm gonna have the SWAT team move in, hold the camp, secure the suspects.
I need the two of you to come back with me and ID them.
You want us to go back?
Time is not on our side here, Mrs. Forrester.
Now you've made some very serious accusations.
I need you to trust me on this one.
How long do we keep them here?
As long as they're valuable, whatever it takes.
I don't feel good about this.
I think we should just cut our losses and head...
I told you, I have all angles covered.
This place was so heavily guarded.
We could be walking into an ambush.
I had the SWAT team move in, they've secured the area, if everything you've told me is true it should all be over very soon.
I'm going to move inside, make sure everything is under control.
I don't see a SWAT team anywhere.
They've gotta be around the front.
You're going to pay for what you did.
Did you actually think you were gonna get away with it?
They killed Russ and Ira and many others.
Why don't you show me where that proof is, we'll get them back to the station for processing.
The incentive was too good to pass.
Now that you're back, let's finish what we started.
Once we give you the evidence you're gonna kill us anyways.
If you don't get the evidence right now, I'm going to shoot your wife.
James gets a little trigger happy sometimes.
If he lays one finger on my wife...
You two really don't want to kill us.
I called the Feds, they're on their way.
Take a look at your security cameras.
I've hooked into your security system.
Your every move is being watched and recorded.
You've got ten seconds to delete the footage, or Lucy here will no longer be a viable organ donor!
Can't do. It is a live stream.
In addition to having the footage streamed to a proxy server, it is being broadcast across the nation.
We knew a few pictures weren't going to be enough.
You two are on your own.
This is above my pay grade.
I haven't killed anyone yet, I don't plan on starting now.
I'll take my chances with the Feds.
You better not have deleted anything.
Serena, where the hell are you going?!
You shouldn't have followed me here.
And let you get away with this?
I should have killed you days ago.
You've been nothing but a pain.
You and that wife, blah, blah, blah.
âª âª âª âª Now this is a vacation.
You know, it was all my fault.
I could have told you how I was feeling.
Instead I just made you read my mind.
It took me getting stabbed to figure it out what a jerk I was.
I played my part, as well.
I know you were hurting and I just lost track of what was important in my life.
And I wouldn't change that at all.
